name: market for energy saving | energy saving | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3813/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'energy saving', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;energy saving' describes the energy savings in MJ by ventilation using ventilation systems with different air exchange rates.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'energy saving',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  energy saving', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
